snippet: Robert Durst, who was part of a Manhattan real estate empire and is now a murder suspect, showed signs of violence from childhood, his brother Douglas said in an interview.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column recalls interview with Manhattan real estate mogul Douglas Durst in which he detailed lifetime of strange and abusive behavior by his older brother Robert, who has now been arrested for murder he seemingly confessed to in HBO documentary The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst.
lead_paragraph: Robert Durst, who was part of a Manhattan real estate empire and is now a murder suspect, showed signs of violence from childhood, his brother Douglas said in an interview.

headline.print_headline: A Sibling Recounts the Violent Ripples Below a Charming Surface
headline.main: A Durst Sibling Recounts the Violent Ripples Below a Charming Surface
